title: Fanren Xiu Xian Chuan: Yan Jia Bao Dazhan

synonyms: A Record of a Mortal's Journey to Immortality Special
alternative_titles.ja: 凡人修仙传 特别篇 燕家堡大战

synopsis:
The special episode picks up right after the first season, telling the story of Han Li's series of adventures in Yan Family Fortress after he discovers the full-scale invasion of the demonic path. Mysterious demonic spies, Dong Xuan'er, a "blind date" arranged by his sect, and Mo Caihuan, the long-lost daughter of the Mo Master, Han Li cautiously steps into an extremely dangerous and perilous situation, navigating seemingly comical and chaotic battlefields.

(Source: Bangumi, translated)
